mapper.select: SELECT c.* FROM user u INNER JOIN collection c on c.collection_user_id = u.user_id Where u.username = #{username}

SELECT a.* , u.username , u.user_avatar_url,cal.collection_article_note from article a INNER JOIN user u ON a.article_user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN collection_article_list cal on cal.article_id = a.article_id where cal.collection_id = #{collectionId}
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM collection_article_list WHERE collection_id = #{collectionId} AND article_id = #{articleId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM collection_article_list cal WHERE cal.collection_id = #{collectionId} And cal.article_id = #{articleId}
